supportContent.en: Use the word in brackets, adding the prefix 'un-' or 'dis-', in the correct form.

questionText.en: 1. Children love <input type='text' class='fill-blank-input' data-blank-id='pref1' placeholder='(wrap)'> parcels at Christmas time.

feedbackIncorrect.ar: الإجابة غير صحيحة. البادئة المناسبة لعكس فعل 'wrap' (يغلف) هي 'un-'. وبما أنها تأتي بعد الفعل 'love'، فإنها تحتاج إلى صيغة الـ gerund (-ing).

supportContent.en: Use the word in brackets, adding the prefix 'un-' or 'dis-', in the correct form.

questionText.en: 2. I almost find that he has unusual opinions. I often <input type='text' class='fill-blank-input' data-blank-id='pref2' placeholder='(agree)'> with him.

supportContent.en: Use the word in brackets, adding the prefix 'un-' or 'dis-', in the correct form.

questionText.en: 3. I’m sure he’s lying but it’s going to be hard to <input type='text' class='fill-blank-input' data-blank-id='pref3' placeholder='(prove)'> his story.

supportContent.en: Use the word in brackets, adding the prefix 'un-' or 'dis-', in the correct form.

questionText.en: 4. After a brief speech the minister <input type='text' class='fill-blank-input' data-blank-id='pref4' placeholder='(veil)'> the new statue.

supportContent.en: Use the word in brackets, adding the prefix 'un-' or 'dis-', in the correct form.

questionText.en: 5. It took the removal men an hour to <input type='text' class='fill-blank-input' data-blank-id='pref5' placeholder='(load)'> our things from the van.

feedbackIncorrect.ar: الإجابة غير صحيحة. البادئة التي تعني إزالة الحمولة (عكس 'load') هي 'un-'. الفعل يأتي بعد 'to' ويحتاج إلى صيغة المصدر.

supportContent.en: Use the word in brackets, adding the prefix 'un-' or 'dis-', in the correct form.

questionText.en: 6. His phone was <input type='text' class='fill-blank-input' data-blank-id='pref6' placeholder='(connect)'> because he didn’t pay his last bill.

feedbackIncorrect.ar: الإجابة غير صحيحة. البادئة التي تعني قطع الاتصال (عكس 'connect') هي 'dis-'. الكلمة تأتي بعد فعل الكينونة 'was' وتصف حالة الهاتف، لذا تحتاج إلى صيغة التصريف الثالث (past participle) لتكوين المبني للمجهول.

supportContent.en: Complete the text with will be, will have, or will have been + the correct form of the verb in brackets.

questionText.en:
1. It’s hard to make predictions too far into the future, but I think I can say quite a lot about my life in about ten years. I think I (still live) will still be living in the same city. By that time, I 1 (finish) <input type='text' class='fill-blank-input' data-blank-id='fut1' placeholder='...'> my studies, and, who knows, perhaps I 2 (find) <input type='text' class='fill-blank-input' data-blank-id='fut2' placeholder='...'> a good job. And I 3 (probably go out) <input type='text' class='fill-blank-input' data-blank-id='fut3' placeholder='...'> with the same friends too!

2. By the time I’m sixty, I expect that nearly everything 4 (change) <input type='text' class='fill-blank-input' data-blank-id='fut4' placeholder='...'> and everyone 5 (try) <input type='text' class='fill-blank-input' data-blank-id='fut5' placeholder='...'> their best to adapt to new circumstances. For example, I can’t imagine that we 6 (use) <input type='text' class='fill-blank-input' data-blank-id='fut6' placeholder='...'> cars, because by then most of the oil in the world 7 (run out) <input type='text' class='fill-blank-input' data-blank-id='fut7' placeholder='...'>. People 8 (travel) <input type='text' class='fill-blank-input' data-blank-id='fut8' placeholder='...'> in electric cars, or perhaps we 9 (walk) <input type='text' class='fill-blank-input' data-blank-id='fut9' placeholder='...'> everywhere. I hope that scientists 10 (solve) <input type='text' class='fill-blank-input' data-blank-id='fut10' placeholder='...'> pollution problem, but who knows! Perhaps some other worse problems 11 (come) <input type='text' class='fill-blank-input' data-blank-id='fut11' placeholder='...'> along by then!

feedbackCorrect.en: Correct! You've applied the future tenses appropriately.
feedbackCorrect.ar: صحيح! لقد طبقت أزمنة المستقبل بشكل مناسب.

feedbackIncorrect.ar: الإجابة غير صحيحة. راجع استخدام أزمنة المستقبل: المستقبل المستمر (will be + V-ing) لوصف فعل مستمر في وقت محدد في المستقبل، والمستقبل التام (will have + P.P.) لوصف فعل سيكتمل قبل وقت محدد في المستقبل. انتبه للكلمات الدالة مثل 'By that time' أو للسياق الذي يشير إلى الاستمرارية أو الاكتمال.
